item.title: Rupert A. Collins: new publication

item.title: Rupert A. Collins: new publication
item.description: The seven deadly sins of DNA barcoding. Molecular Ecology Resources.

item.title: Rupert A. Collins: new publication
item.description: Known knowns, known unknowns, unknown unknowns and unknown knowns in DNA barcoding: a comment on Dowton et al. Systematic Biology.
